data.title: Blue Ridge Christian School
data.meta_description: Nestled on the campus of Calvary University on the south side of the KC metro area, Blue Ridge Christian School develops future, Christ-centered leaders in a caring, safe environment. Our passion is to meet students where they are and inspire them to reach their God-given potential.
data.meta_site_name: Kids Out and About Kansas City
data.text:
Nestled on the campus of Calvary University on the south side of the KC metro area, Blue Ridge Christian School develops future, Christ-centered leaders in a caring, safe environment. Our passion is to meet students where they are and inspire them to reach their God-given potential.

-
